metadata.name: Honey (PayPal Honey)
metadata.description: Automatically find and apply coupon codes when you shop online.

endpoints.purpose: GraphQL product by IDs with offer
GraphQL add non-catalog item to droplist
GraphQL get droplist by canonical URL
GraphQL optimus get product by IDs
GraphQL optimus get product by store/variant IDs
GraphQL get coupon stats by product
GraphQL get store insights by IDs
GraphQL get NNA store by store ID
GraphQL get NNA user by user ID
GraphQL get coupon stats by product
GraphQL get store partials by domain
Remove coupon line item (World Market cart)

keys.purpose: Use latest Honey Checkout app version
Store reminder state for gift cards

workflows.name: Coupon Application Flow
steps: Applies coupon codes via hardcoded endpoints
Updates DOM price fields to reflect discounts
No direct Chrome messaging; all logic is local to content script

workflows.name: Affiliate Tagging & Tracking Flow
steps: Service worker (h0.js) listens for store/session events
Sends affiliate tagging requests to remote endpoints
Tracks session, coupon, and user identifiers
Reports events to Honey backend and third-party endpoints

workflows.name: Offscreen Tagging Flow
triggers: Service worker needs to perform DOM operations not allowed in background
steps: Service worker sends 'offscreen:tag' message to offscreen document (h1-offscreen.js)
Offscreen document performs DOM tagging and responds with 'offscreen:tag:success'

workflows.name: Device/Install Reporting Flow
steps: Service worker listens for install/update events

workflows.name: Gold/Rewards Activation Flow
triggers: User activates Gold/rewards on supported store
steps: Service worker listens for rewardsManager:action, stores:session:activated
Updates local storage with activation state

privacy.minimization: Collects more data than necessary for stated purpose (cart, device, session, user IDs)
privacy.retention: Indefinite storage in local storage and cookies

third_parties.name: JoinHoney.com
third_parties.purpose: Event and product reporting, affiliate management

privacy.policy_compliance: Potential GDPR concerns due to lack of consent and indefinite retention

risks.justification: Extensive third-party network communication for coupon application/removal and affiliate tracking.
Use of localStorage/sessionStorage/cookies for token and credential handling.
Extension requests broad host and API permissions.
